title: Create Your First Skill
description: Learn to create a custom skill (slash command) for Claude Code. Skills are reusable prompt templates.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Create Your First Skill

Create a custom /changelog skill that generates changelogs from git history.

## Objectives
1. Create a skills folder with a changelog skill
2. Define proper frontmatter (name, description, user-invocable)
3. Write a prompt that analyzes git commits and generates a changelog

objectives.description: Create skills folder with changelog skill

bonusObjectives.description: Include version/date parameters in the skill

hints.text: Skills are markdown files in skills/skillname/SKILL.md with YAML frontmatter.
Try: 'Create a /changelog skill that analyzes git history and generates a formatted changelog'

Ask: 'Create skills/changelog/SKILL.md with frontmatter (name: changelog, description: Generate changelog from git commits, user-invocable: true) and a prompt that reads git log and formats commits into a readable changelog'

solution.approach: Create a skill definition file with proper frontmatter and a clear prompt.
solution.example: Create a changelog skill in the skills folder that generates changelogs from git history
alternativeApproaches: Build a /changelog command that summarizes recent commits
Add a skill for generating release notes from git

learningPoints: The markdown body is the prompt template
